dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1910 IH: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Joint Items, Botanic Gardens for fiscal years 2024.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Biggs (for himself, Mr. Rosendale, Mr. Gaetz, Mr. Good of Virginia, Mr. Roy, and Mr. Crane) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Joint Items, Botanic Gardens for fiscal years 2024.

section.header: Limitation on availability of funds for Joint Items, Botanic Gardens for fiscal years 2024
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of the law, amounts authorized to be appropriated or otherwise available for Joint Items, Botanic Gardens for fiscal year 2024 may not exceed $14,759,000.
